speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I've told you assholes to leave me alone!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand that you may be upset. I'm calling about your account with ABC Bank. Can I have your account number to assist you?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the fuck would I give you anything? You're just some low-life calling me!

speaker: Agent
text: I assure you, I'm here to help resolve this matter. Your current balance is $500. How do you prefer to settle this?

speaker: Customer
text: Settle this? You guys are a bunch of crooks! I don't owe you shit!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your frustration. However, it's important for us to discuss this. The account is past due.

speaker: Customer
text: Fuck you! You think I'm gonna pay you just because you say so?

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your honesty. My goal is simply to find a solution. Would you be open to setting up a payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: A payment plan? You’re dreaming! Not a dime from me!

speaker: Agent
text: I respect your decision. Just know I'm here to assist whenever you're ready to discuss options.

speaker: Customer
text: Yeah, whatever. Just get the hell off my phone!

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your time. Have a good day.
